hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Compass#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Market Potion Shop#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Compass#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Damp's Hut#.

hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!
